summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5537 for the improvement of 1st Avenue Northeast, from East 40th Street to East Pacific Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 71154, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
